name: Street Gangsters Super Chase: stop criminals from stealing things from you and people
name_original: Street Gangsters Super Chase: stop criminals from stealing things from you and people
description:
In today’s fast moving expensive world life has become difficult and crime rate has elevated a lot. Gangsters are roaming on streets to grab anything valuable you have, they will chase you, pounce upon you on chance and take your expensive gadgets to sell later. Though these street gangsters are not armed, they are highly fast, keep an eye on street, chase them and bring them to justice.
Game Features

Street crime fighting tools
* Attractive city environment
* Latest Crimes AI
* Crime fighter Characters
* Interactive graphics
* Easy control for crime chaser
